title: Hatsukoi Limited.
original_name: 初恋限定。〈ハツコイリミテッド〉
sinopse: Being an adolescent girl is just one problem after another. Middle-schooler Arihara Ayumi receives a note from a high-schooler, a very large and intimidating boy, Zaitsu Misao, asking her out. Frightened and intrigued, she doesn't know what to do!
